resources.string: Turn off your data or your friend will able to use it
Allow app to read/write System settings or you cant share as we wont able to start hotspot to share

string.name: p2p_connect_to_diff_sender
string.u: Tap here to connect to a different Sender

resources.string: Found a SENDER with SSID: %s. \nPlease click on Settings to Open Wifi and connect to sender .
Failed to connect with %s Hotspot,trying again
Could not connect to ditto Hotspot. Please go to Wifi settings and connect yourself.
Do you want to turn-off Receiver mode?
Without Location permission Ditto is unable to Receive files. dont deny this permission. We dont store your location
Please enable Location permission to proceed with receiving Files Offline. You know how to turn onn location

• Transfer to Android phone open app in'Receiver mode' 

(OR)

• Share to ios/andorid/macos/window :Open WiFi settings and connect to: 
SSID: %s
Password: %s
 And then enter below URL into browser's address bar
%s
Do you want to stop sharing files?
Turn ON \'Send Files\' to start File Sharing
Turn ON \'Receive Files\' to receive files from Sender
